findings.title: Tokens cannot be distributed if there are many buyers
findings.description: The distributeCoin function can exceed the block gas limit due to large array iteration during token distribution, causing functionality failure.

findings.title: Owner can mint tokens as required
findings.description: The current mechanism allows owner to mint tokens as and when required, which can be exploited by multiple owners.

findings.title: Duplicate getter function for public variable
findings.description: Public state variables will generate getter methods automatically. Avoid writing explicit getter methods or declare variables as private to avoid duplicate functions.
